author: Simon Difford
description: Suitably autumnal in colour with rum to the fore with lime freshness balanced by rich pomegranate notes, all smoothed, mellowed and made fluffy by egg white.
name: September Morn
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
